# Eskilstuna Ki-Aikido

> Aikido club in Eskilstuna, Sweden, established 1991. Training for children (7-11), youth (12-15) and adults (15+).

## About
Ki-Aikido club practicing the art of Aikido with focus on mind-body coordination.
Located at Munktellarenan, Verkstadsgatan 5, Eskilstuna.

## Pages
- [Home](https://www.ekia.net/)
- [Training](https://www.ekia.net/traning)
- [Contact](https://www.ekia.net/kontakt)
